attributes.action: Ban hedgetrimmers, strimmers, leafblowers, powered lawnmowers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The worlds greatest gardens, and nature itself, never required any powered machinery to get the job done.

The noise pollution caused is intolerable, the vibrational pollution is also painful, and on top of that they also add loads of CO2 (carbon) to the atmosphere.

Plants do not grow so quickly that anyone can warrant having to use power tools on them. There's not enough wild areas as it is, and not enough plants in any built-up areas.

The petition covers all such machinery that makes the same noise pollution.
